Projects

Below are some of the projects that I'm able to share with the world. Most are just hobby projects that were playgrounds for new technologies that I wanted to learn.


Hamblestone

You're looking at it! Open source, feel free to use it! Just don't pretend to be me...

View Repo
LiveSlide

A realtime presentation application. It's just an MVP, but I am in the process of 1.0! It's a simple app, but I'm proud of the code.

Go to LiveSlideView Repo
Quartz

A super simple library for responsive, front-end development. It's a little outdated.

View SiteView Repo

SMB 1-1

A (kinda wonky) recreation of SMB 1-1 using impactJS. I was new to JS...

View Repo

An (award winning) Wordpress site, designed and developed by yours truly.

socket.io Presenter Demo

A really simple proof of concept of a presentation interface that can update a client in realtime.

Conway's Game of Life

Homebrew Z80 Computer

A passion project I've been working on here and there over the course of the past decade. Lots of notes that I am compiling and will share!
